title: Fair Wheel Bikes tests Shimano Dura-Ace & SRAM 12 speed compatibility w/ 15.81lb Open Up gravel build!
content:
In addition to the Shimano Dura-Ace 9200 Di2 group on the scale, Fair Wheel Bikes also had something else to share with us this week. Namely, a 12-speed road drivetrain with components from four different manufacturers. The result is a very light Open Up with an interesting mix of drivetrains. Why would you want to

The post Fair Wheel Bikes tests Shimano Dura-Ace & SRAM 12 speed compatibility w/ 15.81lb Open Up gravel build! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
